</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 88</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

**Access** Knights of Lastwall have access to this item.

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Carried by many Knights of Lastwall, this amber-colored, fragrant-smelling oil is meant to prevent those who fall in battle from rising as [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). Applying anointing oil to a corpse casts [_gentle repose_](/Spells.aspx?ID=131) on it. The effects last for 24 hours. The oil is repugnant to the undead. An undead creature that touches a corpse treated with this oil is [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) until the contact is broken or the oil's effect wears off.
